widget.name: Barbar
widget.description: Barbar is a concept targeted at working class, urban males, aged 18 and above; where males can network whilst having a hair-cut and/or a drink. It is not a walk-in service but a pre-paid club where only registered members have access to the facilities- bespoke barbing services, hang-out, cool-off, interaction and information.
widget.author: 360WEBWorks NG
